author: JuliaRegistrator

comments.body:
Your `new package` pull request does not meet the guidelines for auto-merging. Please make sure that you have read the [General registry README](https://github.com/JuliaRegistries/General/blob/master/README.md). The following guidelines were not met:

- Name does not meet all of the following: starts with an uppercase letter, ASCII alphanumerics only, not all letters are uppercase.
- Name is not at least five characters long
- The following dependencies do not have a `[compat]` entry that is upper-bounded and only includes a finite number of breaking releases: julia
- Package name similar to 15 existing packages.
<details>
<summary>Similar package names</summary>

1. Similar to ASE. Damerau-Levenshtein distance 2 is at or below cutoff of 2. Normalized visual distance 1.78 is at or below cutoff of 2.50.
2. Similar to AES. Damerau-Levenshtein distance 2 is at or below cutoff of 2. Normalized visual distance 2.17 is at or below cutoff of 2.50.
3. Similar to AWS. Damerau-Levenshtein distance 2 is at or below cutoff of 2.
4. Similar to AMD. Damerau-Levenshtein distance 2 is at or below cutoff of 2.
5. Similar to ECC. Damerau-Levenshtein distance 2 is at or below cutoff of 2.
6. Similar to ADI. Damerau-Levenshtein distance 2 is at or below cutoff of 2.
7. Similar to CRC. Damerau-Levenshtein distance 2 is at or below cutoff of 2.
8. Similar to GCP. Damerau-Levenshtein distance 2 is at or below cutoff of 2.
9. Similar to SMC. Damerau-Levenshtein distance 2 is at or below cutoff of 2.
10. Similar to VQC. Damerau-Levenshtein distance 2 is at or below cutoff of 2.
11. Similar to Amb. Damerau-Levenshtein distance 2 is at or below cutoff of 2.
12. Similar to GAP. Damerau-Levenshtein distance 2 is at or below cutoff of 2.
13. Similar to Ant. Damerau-Levenshtein distance 2 is at or below cutoff of 2.
14. Similar to GR. Damerau-Levenshtein distance 2 is at or below cutoff of 2.
15. Similar to EAGO. Damerau-Levenshtein distance 2 is at or below cutoff of 2.
</details>

- I was not able to load the package (i.e. `import AGC` failed). See the CI logs for details.

Note that the guidelines are only required for the pull request to be merged automatically. However, it is **strongly recommended** to follow them, since otherwise the pull request needs to be manually reviewed and merged by a human.

Since you are registering a new package, please make sure that you have also read the package naming guidelines: https://julialang.github.io/Pkg.jl/dev/creating-packages/#Package-naming-guidelines-1



---
If you want to prevent this pull request from being auto-merged, simply leave a comment. If you want to post a comment without blocking auto-merging, you must include the text `[noblock]` in your comment.
<!-- [noblock] -->
<!---
this_is_the_single_automerge_comment
--->

body:
- Registering package: AGC
- Repository: https://github.com/sonosole/AutoGainCtrl
- Created by: @sonosole
- Version: v0.1.1
- Commit: a3fbd21fa922d7a2001f7b6d3e6c20613b801903
- Git reference: main
- Release notes:
<!-- BEGIN RELEASE NOTES -->
> Automatic gain control module for speech signals. Having online and offline functions, also this module could also be used for data augmentation for deep learning.
<!-- END RELEASE NOTES -->
title: New package: AGC v0.1.1
